coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: Printed on the inside, a small tag reads 'Made by solace'.
coreAttributes.name: cyber bra
coreAttributes.description: A bra with stylish cutouts and modern holographic accents.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the bra over [npc.her] head and down onto [npc.her] torso before tying it behind [npc.her] back.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] head and down onto [npc2.her] torso before tying it behind [npc2.her] back.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(shove)] the bra over [npc2.namePos] head and down onto [npc2.her] torso before roughly tying it behind [nps2.her] back.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the back of [npc.her] bra before pulling it off [npc.her] chest.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the back of [npc2.namePos] bra before pulling it off [npc2.her] chest.

replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] [npc2.namePos] bra back down, covering [npc2.her] torso.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc.her] bra up to just below [npc.her] chin, fully exposing [npc.her] torso.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] bra up to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] [npc2.namePos] bra to just below [npc2.her] chin, fully exposing [npc2.her] torso.
